home.title: Aston Vila Hub

whatIsHub.title: What is Aston Vila Hub?
whatIsHub.description: Aston Vila Hub is the definitive platform for Aston Vila fans, offering an immersive and personalized experience with all content related to the most decorated club in the world.

curatedContent.title: Curated Content
curatedContent.description: Access the best videos, news, and updates from Aston Vila, automatically selected and categorized for you.

multiplatform.title: Multiplatform
multiplatform.description: Content from YouTube, Twitter, TikTok, and more, all in one place so you never miss anything important.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Stay up to date with personalized alerts about new content from your favorite channels and categories.

premium.title: Premium Benefits
premium.description: Unlock the full potential of Aston Vila Hub with our premium subscription and enjoy exclusive advantages.

exclusiveChannels.title: Exclusive Channels
exclusiveChannels.description: Access to premium channels with exclusive content and in-depth analysis.

noAds.title: Ad-Free
noAds.description: Enjoy an ad-free experience across the entire platform.

history.title: Historical Archive
history.description: Access our complete archive of historical Aston Vila moments.

analysis.title: Advanced Analysis
analysis.description: Detailed statistics and exclusive tactical analysis of each match.

carlos.name: Carlos Rodríguez
carlos.quote: "Aston Vila Hub has changed the way I follow Aston Vila. All information in one place and perfectly categorized. Amazing service!"

laura.name: Laura Martínez
laura.quote: "The personalized notifications are great, I never miss new content from my favorite channels. The premium subscription is totally recommended."

miguel.name: Miguel Sánchez
miguel.quote: "Even the free version is exceptional. The interface is intuitive and I find all relevant content quickly. I'm definitely upgrading to Premium."

cta.title: Join the Aston Vila supporter community
cta.description: Thousands of fans already enjoy the best experience to follow and enjoy all content related to Aston Vila. Join our community today!

ownerInfo.title: 1.1. Owner Information
ownerInfo.address: Address: C/ Sant Rafael 104, 07701, Palma de Mallorca

purpose.title: 1.2. Purpose
purpose.description: "Aston Vila Hub" (hereinafter, "the Website") acts as a hub for Aston Vila related content, allowing users to:
purpose.feature1: Embed videos from platforms such as YouTube and TikTok.
purpose.feature2: Create user profiles and manage favorites lists.
purpose.feature3: Possibly link to an online store on another domain.
purpose.feature4: Access subscription services with additional paid features.
purpose.acceptance: The use of the Website grants the status of User and expresses full and unreserved acceptance of all the points contained in this legal document.

requirements.title: 1.3. Usage Requirements
requirements.description: To use the services offered, the following is required:
requirements.age: Be of legal age or have parental/guardian authorization.
requirements.truthful: Provide truthful and lawful information when registering.

embeddedContent.title: 1.4. Embedded Content
embeddedContent.description: Embedded videos from YouTube/TikTok are displayed through these platforms' official player. The owner assumes no responsibility for third-party content or its availability or legality. Users must respect copyright policies, and unauthorized content will be removed if its infringement is reported.

subscriptions.title: 1.5. Subscriptions and Paid Services
subscriptions.description: If the User opts for membership services, they agree to:
subscriptions.payment: Pay the corresponding fees in the manner indicated.
subscriptions.usage: Use the features in accordance with the license granted.
subscriptions.cancellation: Cancel the subscription whenever desired (payments already made are not refundable, except as required by law).

liability.title: 1.6. Liability
liability.description: The owner does not guarantee the permanent availability of the Website or the absence of errors. It will not be responsible for damages arising from the use of the Website, unless they result from willful misconduct or gross negligence.

branding.title: Brand Identity
branding.description: Configure site name, logo and colors

youtube.title: YouTube Search Configuration
youtube.description: Configure search terms and language for automatic YouTube video import
youtube.searchTermsPlaceholder:
Aston Vila highlights
Aston Vila goals
Aston Vila analysis
youtube.searchTermsDescription: Enter one search term per line. These will be randomly used to search for videos on YouTube.

howItWorksItems.random: The system randomly selects a search term from the list
howItWorksItems.search: Searches for videos on YouTube using that term
howItWorksItems.language: Prioritizes videos with the selected language
howItWorksItems.categorize: Videos are automatically categorized using AI
howItWorksItems.customize: You can add specific terms (players, events, etc.)

social.title: Social Media and Contact
social.description: Configure contact information and social links

seo.title: SEO and Metadata
